mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.cat_id AS catId,A.title AS title,A.description AS description,A.pic_ids AS picIds,A.pic_path AS picPath,A.file_type AS fileType,A.width AS width,A.height AS height,A.cell AS cell,A.hits AS hits,A.shows AS shows,A.scans AS scans,A.to_all AS toAll,A.price AS price,A.expiry_date_from AS expiryDateFrom,A.expiry_date_to AS expiryDateTo,A.is_top AS isTop,A.file_id AS fileId,A.link_url AS linkUrl,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
